fail.marc.onairclock.name: On Air Clock
fail.marc.onairclock.author: Marc Herrmann
fail.marc.onairclock.description: Simple On Air Clock for Elgato Stream Deck

fun.shiro.ytmd.name: YouTube Music Desktop Connector
fun.shiro.ytmd.author: XeroxDev
fun.shiro.ytmd.description: This Stream Deck Plugin allows you to control the YouTube Music Desktop App (https://github.com/ytmdesktop/ytmdesktop)

org.tynsoe.streamdeck.wsproxy.name: WebSocket Proxy
org.tynsoe.streamdeck.wsproxy.author: Yann Bizeul
org.tynsoe.streamdeck.wsproxy.description: A WebServices proxy to connect an Elgato Stream Deck to a Node-RED server

zayik.commandsender.name: CommandSender
zayik.commandsender.author: Zayik
zayik.commandsender.description: Stream Deck plugin for sending UDP/TCP messages from a key press.

com.zstefanovic.steamscroll.name: Steamscroll
com.zstefanovic.steamscroll.author: Zoran Stefanovic
com.zstefanovic.steamscroll.description: Plugin for Elgato Stream Deck + to scroll through installed Steam games and launch them
